sentences.sContent: Electro-deposition is an electrochemical process used to reproduce accurately a cavity or core form from a given pattern.
sentences.sContent_eng: Electro-deposition is an electrochemical process used to reproduce accurately a cavity or core form from a given pattern.
sentences.sCn: 电解加工是根据给定的样品精确地再造凸凹模的一种电化学加工工艺。
